ygData.subject: Fans in the bleechers
ygData.msgSnippet: Lady Hawk stepped outside the base to watch the battle. The two attackers were impressive to watch. The Alliance obviously had some very skillful adversaries.

Lady Hawk stepped outside the base to watch the battle. The two 
attackers were impressive to watch. The Alliance obviously had some 
very skillful adversaries. This could work to her advantage. She 
transformed to her half Hawk mode to get a better view. her third eye 
constantly changed to get a good look at the attackers. She found a 
spectrum which gave her a shadowy view of Inu and Koj, They flew with 
grace and form like few she ever remembered. Her obligation told her 
to report the frequency but she had no true loyalty toward the 
alliance or it's second rate megalomaniac in charge. She just sat 
back and watched the action unfold not having any intention of 
interfering unless the battle came to her.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Squizzy::
> 
> She walked out and stood near Zardus. "How many do you think there 
> are?"
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> > I hate operas. That was just a random comment stimulated by my 
> desire 
> > to run a sharp blade through the Arizona Opera Productor's head.
> > 
> > I see nothing wrong with the post, Ryo, except for how would you 
> get 
> > ice spikes in Saudi Arabia?
> > 
> > ::Zardus/WarMachine/Bloodystrike/Reptilica/DevilDuer::
> > 
> > WarMachine roars, his scanners locking on to Koj's signature, 
even 
> > though it was a shaky lock due to the cloaking device. Running at 
> him 
> > and Inu, WarMachine approaches from behind, firing missiles at 
the 
> > two.
> > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > "Shields, reactivate!" Zardus orders, seeing the trees flying at 
> the 
> > Alliance base. Jumping back as the shields reactivate, Zardus, 
> along 
> > with the autoguns, fires at the trees that manage to get through, 
> ice 
> > and wood chunks showering him, but nothing major. He takes a step 
> > back to keep his balance.
> > 
> > Behind him, Reptilica gives a pained yelp as he is hit by a large 
> > wood piece, sending him falling backwards into the Alliance base. 
> > Bloodystrike ducks behind the door as he sees the wood flying at 
> him, 
> > evading it and watching some of it land on Reptilica. He ducks 
his 
> > head out of the doorway, firing at Inu.
> > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > DevilDuer looks up into the vent, watching Diamond slither away. 
He 
> > was kinda glad she had joined, or else Vamprah might have gotten 
> > away. A tasmanian devil wasn't really made for vent exploration.
> > 
> > DevilDuer picks up the datapad and looks at it, wondering who 
> > DarkFate was.
> > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
